Package game

Class Zombie

java.lang.Object
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
game.ZombieActor
game.Zombie
All Implemented Interfaces:
edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Capable, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Printable, edu.monash.fit2099.interfaces.ActorInterface
public class Zombie
extends game.ZombieActor
A Zombie. Zombies have 2 intrinsic attacks -- bite and punch. A bite attack allows them to recover their health but it is harder to land. They also have limbs that can be dropped onto the map if they are attacked, which will also weaken them in the process by restricting them from doing certain actions that they usually could.
Author:
Bryan Ho

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type Method Description
    boolean attackMissed​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Weapon weapon)
    If a Zombie bites, their chance of missing that attack is a lot higher than any other attack they use.
    java.lang.String bonusEffect​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Weapon weapon, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map)
    If a Zombie bites, they recover 5 HP.
    edu.monash.fit2099.engine.IntrinsicWeapon getIntrinsicWeapon()
    The Zombie has a default probability of 50% to either bite or punch.
    void hurt​(int points)
    After inflicting damage to the Zombie, there is a 80% chance for the Zombie to lose a random limb.
    edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action playTurn​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actions actions, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action lastAction, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Display display)
    The Zombie has a 10% chance to say "Braaaaaaains".
    If not, it will pick up a weapon at its location.
    If not, it will attack an adjacent Human if there is one.
    If not, it will chase any Human within 10 spaces.
    If no humans are close enough, it will wander randomly.

    Zombies can only hold one weapon at a time.

  • Constructor Details

    • Zombie

      public Zombie​(java.lang.String name)
      Constructor.
      Parameters:
      name - The name of the Zombie.

  • Method Details

    • getIntrinsicWeapon

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.IntrinsicWeapon getIntrinsicWeapon()
      The Zombie has a default probability of 50% to either bite or punch. The probability of biting will increase every time the Zombie loses an arm.
      Returns:
      An IntrinsicWeapon of a bite attack or punch attack.

    • playTurn

      public edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action playTurn​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actions actions, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Action lastAction, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Display display)
      The Zombie has a 10% chance to say "Braaaaaaains".
      If not, it will pick up a weapon at its location.
      If not, it will attack an adjacent Human if there is one.
      If not, it will chase any Human within 10 spaces.
      If no humans are close enough, it will wander randomly.

      Zombies can only hold one weapon at a time. They must have at least an arm to be able to hold a weapon. If a Zombie does not have a leg, it cannot move every second turn. If a Zombie has no legs, they cannot move at all.
      Specified by:
      playTurn in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
      Parameters:
      actions - List of possible Actions.
      lastAction - Previous Action, if it was a multiturn action.
      map - The map where the current Zombie is.
      display - The Display where the Zombie's utterances will be displayed.
      Returns:
      An Action from one of its behaviours.

    • attackMissed

      public boolean attackMissed​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Weapon weapon)
      If a Zombie bites, their chance of missing that attack is a lot higher than any other attack they use.
      Parameters:
      weapon - The weapon that the Zombie is holding.
      Returns:
      True if they miss, False otherwise.

    • bonusEffect

      public java.lang.String bonusEffect​(edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Weapon weapon, edu.monash.fit2099.engine.GameMap map)
      If a Zombie bites, they recover 5 HP. If not, the Zombie will drop any limbs if they are attacked.
      Parameters:
      weapon - The weapon that the Zombie is holding.
      map - The map to apply the effect on if applicable.
      Returns:
      A description that the Zombie recovers 5 HP after a successful bite attack.

    • hurt

      public void hurt​(int points)
      After inflicting damage to the Zombie, there is a 80% chance for the Zombie to lose a random limb. If they do lose a limb, the Zombie is weakened according to the type of limb they lost.
      Overrides:
      hurt in class edu.monash.fit2099.engine.Actor
      Parameters:
      points - The amount of damage inflicted on the Zombie.
